sentence:
Ms. SALINAS. Madam Speaker, I rise to recognize the city of Beaverton  and Mayor Lacey Beaty for being selected as 1 of 50 finalists in the  2025 Bloomberg Mayors Challenge.

Selected from over 630 global applicants, Beaverton's bold initiative  reimagines housing through community-led, intergenerational models that  put homeownership…
